humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there is metastatic carcinoma in one out of one left rotter lymph node (1/1) and no carcinoma seen in 18 out of 21 assessed lymph nodes (0/18, 18/21) in the left breast and axilla. Therefore, the N stage is N1 as per Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma to one lymph node in the left axilla, which measures 6.0 cm (1/1). No carcinoma was seen in the other 18 lymph nodes examined (0/18). Therefore, the pathologic N stage is N1.
